title: Bag (Indonesia), early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, glass beads
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warp and weft patterning, strung beadwork
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment, Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program, and Au Panier Fleuri Funds
description: Red woven bag with stripes and geometric pattern in wide middle stripe. Has long fringe of strung beads starting at the opening and hanging past the bottom of the bag in two shades of green, two shades of blue, yellow, white, and black beads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag (Indonesia), early 20th century. Medium: cotton, glass beads
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warp and weft patterning, strung beadwork. 
Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment, Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program, and Au Panier Fleuri Funds. 1999-5-21
